title: Text Wrapping Test Report
subtitle: Demonstrating proper text wrapping in cells
footnote: All text should wrap properly without being cut off

rows.mediumText: This is a medium length text
rows.longText: This is a very long text that should wrap properly within the cell boundaries without being cut off or causing the table to overflow horizontally on the page
Another example of a very long text string that needs to wrap within the cell to demonstrate that the text wrapping functionality is working correctly in the PDF export component
The third row also contains very long text to ensure consistency across all rows and to verify that the wrapping mechanism handles multiple rows with long content appropriately
